verses.verse: Then said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> unto me, Go <WH3212> yet, love <WH157> a woman <WH802> beloved <WH157> of her friend <WH7453>, yet an adulteress <WH5003>, according to the love <WH160> of the LORD <WH3068> toward the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, who look <WH6437> to other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and love <WH157> flagons <WH809> of wine <WH6025>. of wine: Heb. of grapes
So I bought <WH3739> her to me for fifteen <WH6240> <WH2568> pieces of silver <WH3701>, and for an homer <WH2563> of barley <WH8184>, and an half homer <WH3963> of barley <WH8184>: half: Heb. lethech

And I said <WH559> unto her, Thou shalt abide <WH3427> for me many <WH7227> days <WH3117>; thou shalt not play the harlot <WH2181>, and thou shalt not be <WH1961> for another man <WH376>: so will I also be for thee.

For the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall abide <WH3427> many <WH7227> days <WH3117> without a king <WH4428>, and without a prince <WH8269>, and without a sacrifice <WH2077>, and without an image <WH4676>, and without an ephod <WH646>, and without teraphim <WH8655>: image: Heb. a standing, or, statue, or, pillar

Afterward <WH310> shall the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> return <WH7725>, and seek <WH1245> the LORD <WH3068> their God <WH430>, and David <WH1732> their king <WH4428>; and shall fear <WH6342> the LORD <WH3068> and his goodness <WH2898> in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117>.
